title: I Will Sing of My Redeemer
author: Philip P. Bliss

verses.text: I will sing of my Redeemer, And His wondrous love to me; On the cruel cross He suffered, From the curse to set me free.
I will tell the wondrous story, How my lost estate to save, In His boundless love and mercy, He the ransom freely gave.
I will sing of my Redeemer, And His heavenly love to me; He from death to life hath brought me, Son of God, with Him to be.

chorus.text: Sing, Oh, sing of my Redeemer, With His blood He purchased me; On the cross He sealed my pardon, Paid the debt and made me free.
